tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) attacks due to the lack of header length validation. Without enforcing a maximum header length, attackers can exploit this vulnerability by sending excessively large headers, causing the system to slow down or become unresponsive during parsing.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `riverline/multipart-parser` library to the patch version.
